captions.text:
INTRO-----
HI GUYS I’M CATIE WAYNE AND THIS IS ANIMALIST

NEWS.
DID YOU KNOW THAT BLACK PANTHERS AREN’T

A REAL SPECIES?!
THEY’RE ACTUALLY MISIDENTIFIED MELANISTIC

LEOPARDS, JAGUARS, AND OTHER BIG CATS.
MELANISM IS THE OPPOSITE CONDITION OF ALBINISM

WHICH MAKES THE ANIMAL COMPLETELY BLACK.
SO OUR INTERN, AMBER, HAS BEEN TRYING REALLY

HARD TO FIGURE OUT WHY PEOPLE STARTED CALLING
THESE CATS BLACK PANTHERS AND- YOU KNOW WHAT…

LET’S JUST BRING HER OUT HERE.
HEY AMBER!

AMBER:
HEY CATIE I HAVE BEEN SEARCHING EVERYWHERE

TO FIGURE THIS OUT!
I’VE CONTACTED TONS OF UNIVERSITIES, ZOOS,
RESCUE GROUPS, EVERYTHING I CAN THINK OF

CATIE:
AND?

AMBER:
AND HERE’S YOUR ANSWER…
I HAVE NO FREAKING IDEA HOW IT ALL STARTED.

CATIE:
WAIT WHAT? WE DON’T PAY YOU TO COME UP EMPTY
HANDED.

AMBER:
OKAY CALM DOWN… I HAVE A THEORY…

CATIE:
GO ON…

AMBER:
ACCORDING TO THE NICE PEOPLE I SPOKE TO AT

WILD ANIMAL SANCTUARY, THE WORD “PANTHER”
MEANS CAT.

CATIE:
WHICH IS WHY MOST FELINES HAVE THE WORD “PANTHERA”

IN THEIR GENUS NAME LIKE “PANTHERA LEO”
AND “PANTHERA PARDUS”!

AMBER:
I THINK PANTHERA UN-CIA IS MY FAVORITE. THAT’S

A SNOW LEOPARD FOR ALL YA’LL NON SCIENTIFIC
FOLK.

CATIE:
OKAY SO ANYWAYS WHAT YOU’RE BASICALLY SAYING

IS THAT “PANTHER” DOESN’T REFER TO ANY
SPECIFIC CAT?

AMBER:
THAT’S EXACTLY WHAT I’M SAYING. SO IF

PEOPLE SAW A BIG BLACK CAT AND WEREN’T EXACTLY
SURE IF IT WAS A LEOPARD OR A JAGUAR, THE

EASIEST THING TO SAY WOULD BE “OH MY GOD
LOOK AT THAT BLACK PANTHER!”

CATIE:
BUT-BUT WHAT ABOUT BAGHEERA THE BLACK PANTHER

FROM THE JUNGLE BOOK? ARE YOU SAYING THAT
MY CHILDHOOD WAS A LIE?

AMBER:
I’M SORRY, BUT BAGHEERA WAS PROBABLY ACTUALLY

A MELANISTIC LEOPARD. UNFORTUNATELY, THERE’S
ALSO NO SUCH THING AS A PINK PANTHER.

CATIE:
AMBER. YOU MAY LEAVE.

AMBER:
BUT I WAS JUST-

CATIE:
AMBER. YOU MAY LEAVE. WELL IF YOU GUYS THINK

YOU HAVE A BETTER IDEA LET US KNOW IN THE
COMMENTS DOWN BELOW!
